name: Kusa
description:
In Kusa, you play as grass 草, and must keep the collective spirit of your grass patch alive. Your natural enemies, sheep 羊, will try to destroy you, so  spread your patches of grass and consume the sheeps' droppings to become more and more powerful. Increase your power level to 2500 to complete a level, and complete all ten levels to win. Be careful though; failing a level will send you back to the beginning!

This game contains an in-game tutorial page. Basic controls: WASD to move and Spacebar to begin a level. Use the mouse or hit Enter to navigate menus.

Kusa was made for the Ludum Dare 46 Jam by Benjamin Nielsen and Oliver Morrish.

Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/kusa
